subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Spurs have lost three games in a row for the first time this season and must win three straight against the Mavericks, beginning tonight (9:30 ET), to reach the conference finals.
snippet: The Spurs have lost three games in a row for the first time this season and must win three straight against the Mavericks, beginning tonight (9:30 ET), to reach the conference finals.
